verses.text: Behold, bless ye the \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*, all yeservants of the \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*, which by night stand in the house of the \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*.
Lift up your hands inthe sanctuary, and bless the \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*.
The \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*that made heaven and earth bless thee out of Zion.
